Description:
Detects modification addition to the 'TypedPaths' key in the user or admin registry via the commandline. Which might indicate persistence attempt

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Persistence Via TypedPaths - CommandLine
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where command like '%\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\explorer\typedpaths%'
